data.name: War Thunder - Japanese Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Note!

To activate this DLC for your Gaijin account, it has to be linked to Steam account that made the purchase. If you aren't sure it is, please follow the instruction. If you still have any questions, contact our support (login on the same website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Chi-He (5th Regiment) tank (Rank 2 Japan);
  • Ki-44-I 34 Shoki fighter (Rank 1 Japan);
  • 120000 Silver Lions;
  • Premium Account for 7 days.

Chi-He (5th Regiment)

Chi-He was a Japanese medium tank designed in the early 1940’s. It was based on the Chi-Ha medium tank, and differed from it in enhanced secondary weaponry. The tank is armed with a 47mm Type 1 cannon with 120 rounds of ammunition, the range of shells available consists of high-explosive fragmentation and armor-piercing shells, and it is additionally equipped with one 7.7mm hull machine gun and one 7.7mm Type 97 AA machine gun. A 212 hp diesel engine can accelerate the tank to a maximum speed of 44 km/h.

Ki-44-I 34 Shoki

The single-engine Ki-44 fighter was developed in the early 1940’s by the design bureau of the Japanese Nakajima company. The main requirements for it were a high flight speed - at least 600 km / h and a climb rate of 5000m in no more than 5 minutes. All available Japanese engines were relatively low-power, so it was decided to install the engine of a Ki-49 bomber. To test it, a separate fighter squadron was formed (47th Chutai "Kawasemi Buntai" ), which took part in the fighting in Malaya in 1942. The main armament of this model of the fighter is represented by two 12.7mm Ho-103 machine guns and two 7.7mm Type 89 machine guns.

All premium vehicles allow you to earn increased Research Points and Silver Lions for each battle and comes furnished with all available modifications.

With a Premium account (also purchasable in the game for Golden Eagles) you will earn more Research Points and Silver Lions during each battle for a set amount of days. This is cumulative with bonuses from premium vehicles!

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!
  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

data.short_description: The Chi-He medium tank and the Ki-44-I 34 Shoki fighter, premium bonuses, 7 days of Premium account and Silver Lions - the way of the War Thunder samurai!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.1 level video card: AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level video card or higher and drivers: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 570 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 95 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
